record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - December 13, 2007)

[Page: H15426]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, due to a pre-existing commitment to visit wounded heroes at Walter Reed Army Medical Center, I missed three rollcall votes this morning. I ask that the Record show that had I been present: For rollcall No. 1156--Ordering the Previous Question on H. Res. 869--I would have voted "nay"; for rollcall No. 1157--Ordering the Previous Question H. Res. 859--I would have voted "nay"; for rollcall No. 1158--Adoption of the Rule of consideration of the conference report on H.R. 2082--I would have voted "nay."
